text: The 2014 British Supersport season was the 27th British Supersport Championship season. ==Race calendar and results== The 2014 MCE Insurance British Superbike Championship calendar has been announced on 10 October 2013 by MSVR. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- !colspan=8| 2014 Calendar |- !colspan=2| Round !
